import React from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import { savePaymentMethod, saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartAction' import { Row, Col, Button, Card, ListGroup, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' function Placeorderpage() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) cart.ItemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) cart.shippingPrice = (cart.ItemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 10).toFixed(2) cart.taxPrice = Number((0.018) * cart.ItemsPrice).toFixed(2) cart.TotalPrice = ( Number(cart.ItemsPrice) + Number(cart.shippingPrice) + Number(cart.taxPrice) ) const dispatch = useDispatch() const history = useNavigate() if (!cart.paymentMethod) { history('/payment') } return (

Complete Purchase

 Product: ₺{cart.ItemsPrice} Cargo: ₺{cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ₺{cart.taxPrice} Total: ₺{cart.TotalPrice}
) } export default Placeorderpage
